page.title: 10TRADE IN BETHERSDEN
page.content: DESPITE THE TREND TOWARDS HYPERMARKETS BETHERSDEN HAS A SELF-SERVICE STORE/ SUB POST OFFICE, GARAGE AND BUTCHER FROM WHICH MAY BE PURCHASED MOST COMMODITIES USED IN EVERYDAY LIFE.ON THE MAIN ASHFORD ROAD MAY BE FOUND AN EXCELLENT NEWSAGENTS,OPEN DAILY,INCLUD -ING SUNDAY MORNING,FOR THE SALE OF SUCH DIVERSE ITEMS AS TOYS TO TOILET ROLLS.HOUSEBOUND FOLK AND OTHERS APPRECIATE DAILY DELIVERY OF MILK AND NEWSPAPERS,WHILST ONCE WEEKLY THE FISH AND CHIP,ICECREAM AND FRESH VEGETABLE VANS CALL.COAL HAS BEEN DELIVERED BY THE SAME VILLAGE FAMILY FOR OVER THREE GENERATIONS.GARDEN PRODUCE,HOMEMADE BREAD,CAKES AND JAMS MAY BE BOUGHT AT THE CHURCH TRADING STALL,FREE RANGE EGGS FROM A FARM AND WINE FROM A LOCAL IMPORTER.AMATEUR TRADERS ABOUND AT VILLAGE BOOT FAIRS,SELLING VARIED UNWANTED GOODS FROM THEIR RENTED PITCH
